channel.title: PlayActionX 24/7
channel.description:
[URL=http://picasion.com/How-To-Make-a-GIF][IMG]http://i.picasion.com/pic58/25b725e0ecfa117cd290b3fc83ad5d43.gif[/img][/URL][URL=http://www.picasion.com/How-To-Make-a-GIF][/URL] WELCOME TO PLAYACTIONX!
[size=20pt]100% uptime[/size] only downtime is for updates. [color=orange][i][u]We have highscores![/u][/i][/color] 2000 Exp Rate!
[size=20pt][b]Turmoil[/b][/size] + [i]Custom points shops[/i](PAPoints) Another way to [size=20pt]EARN [/size]items. [color=blue]Perfect Switching![/color]
[size=20pt][color=brown]Working Caskets![/color][/size]
22 skills to train from including [size=20pt][color=green]the custom skill BossSlayer[/color][/size] which is a huge hit!
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2nr1wmf.jpg[/img]
Custom raffling the gives out once enough players have bet up and each player can do it 5 times. the more time you do it the better chance you have of getting the prize!
Staff list - Owner - Lordzenthar Co-Owner - Mod Mike Admins- Mod Kyle Open Mods- X Combat Open Open
Webclient - http://PlayActionX.webs.com/playnow
website - http://PlayActionX.webs.com/
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/rvavkx.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/wbxvev.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.picasion.com/pic56/3a45adb5edbb9f00dd16841f62f376a9.gif[/img]
Working Clue Scrolls! [IMG]http://i.picasion.com/pic56/9281f26822db7067f029629316400687.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2vn2h77.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2yjtpnb.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2daggvq.jpg[/img]
